Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 68th overall pick, by New York (N) in 1967...
Injured on 8/3/1969 with a Bruised Heel, out for 3 days...
Injured on 5/2/1970 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 6/1/1970 with a Strained Abdominal Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 8/11/1970 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Drafted in 1st round, 13th overall pick, by Cleveland in 1973...
Traded from Cleveland to St. Louis on 1/31/1973 (Going to STL: LF R. LeFlore. Going to CLE: P T. Pierce)...
Injured on 4/24/1975 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 9/29/1976...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Pittsburgh on 5/13/1978...
Injured on 6/22/1978 with a Broken Finger, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 9/8/1978 with a Inflamed Rib Cage Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 9/26/1978 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 2-3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/17/1980 to a 3-year deal worth $3,250,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/16/1983 to a 3-year deal worth $685,000 per year...
